channel.title: Gantt on PINKPIG
channel.description: Recent content in Gantt on PINKPIG

item.title: Gantt Chart
item.description:
gantt title Project Milestone Plan dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD section Milestone 1: Requirement Definition and Framework Design Complete user profile and input data analysis :done, m1_task1, 2025-04-01, 7d Deliverables: User & Input Requirement Docs :done, m1_deliverables, after m1_task1, 0d

section Milestone 2: Prototype Development of Core Interface
Define interaction logic and interface framework :active, m2_task1, 2025-04-08, 7d
Deliverables: Interaction Design & Interface Draft :m2_deliverables, after m2_task1, 0d

section Milestone 3: High-Fidelity Design System Construction
Create medical-grade color system and data library :m3_task1, 2025-04-15, 14d
Deliverables: High-Fidelity Design Draft & Documentation :m3_deliverables, after m3_task1, 0d

section Milestone 4: Development Collaboration and Delivery
Develop UI system and review workflow    :m4_task1, 2025-04-29, 21d
Build sensor data simulator and design handover doc :m4_task2, after m4_task1, 0d
Deliverables: Resource Package & Testing Video   :m4_deliverables, after m4_task2, 0d
